name: Rocket Fuel Factory
description: Makes rocket fuel from wood or food. One resource is used to make one unit of rocket fuel.

upgrades.name: Metabolic Engineering
upgrades.description: Rocket fuel is produced faster and uses half the resources.

modes.name: Use Food
modes.description: The factory will use food to make rocket fuel.

modes.name: Use Wood
modes.description: The factory will use wood to make rocket fuel.

modes.name: Disable Factory
modes.description: The factory will fully halt production.
